resources.string: What do you know about California?

1. Which of the following statements are true? (There is more than one right answer.)
California is the third largest state by area.
California officially became a state in 1848.
You can find the largest living tree in California.
The highest mountain peak of the USA is located in California.

Shows that California is the official state.
